metadata.title: CVE-2022-24302 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
In Paramiko before 2.10.1, a race condition (between creation and chmod) in the write_private_key_file function could allow unauthorized information disclosure.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-24302` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-paramiko - 2.7.2-1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: paramiko package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.7.2-1ubuntu1.1').
